column3: Please squash the changes into one commit\n
@laanwj Done. I left them separated for review, but whatever works for you.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/31a4b898be9beef6041006fbc9063b2880f488a6 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
I really like that in the case of code changes, but for reformatting the release notes you don't need to go to that level of micromanagement :)\n
